wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.che: Please make sure nobody looks into your screen unless you want them to have access to your funds.
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.rec: On the following screen, you will see a 12-word phrase. This is your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Luxcore in order to restore your wallet.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.display.di: The phrase is case sensitive. Please make sure you write down and save your recovery phrase. You will need this phrase to use and restore your wallet.
Yes, I have written it down.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.entry.dial: I understand that my wallet and tokens are held securely on this device only and not on any servers.
I understand that if this application is moved to another device or is deleted, my wallet can be only recovered with the backup phrase that I have written down and saved in a secure place
Tap each word in the correct order to verify your recovery phrase

wallet.receive.page.walletReceiveInstruc: Share this wallet address to receive payments. To protect your privacy, new addresses are generated automatically once you use them.
wallet.redeem.dialog.certificateHint: Click here to select your certificate file on your computer
wallet.redeem.dialog.headline: Lux Redemption
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.forceV:
To redeem your Lux, upload your certificate or copy and paste your redemption code from the certificate. Below is an example of a redemption key. Your key will look similar:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

If you upload a PDF file with your certificate, the redemption code will be automatically extracted.

If you upload an encrypted certificate, you will need to provide your email address, Lux passcode and Lux amount to decrypt your certificate and your redemption code will be automatically extracted.
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.paperV: To redeem your Lux, enter your shielded vending key from the certificate, choose a wallet where Lux should be redeemed and enter 9 word mnemonic passphrase.
wallet.redeem.dialog.instructions.regula:
To redeem your Lux, upload your certificate or copy and paste your redemption code from the certificate. Below is an example of a redemption key. Your key will look similar:

B_GQOAffMBeRIn6vh1hJmeOT3ViS_TmaT4XAHAfDVH0=

If you upload a PDF file with your certificate, a redemption code will be automatically extracted.

If you upload an encrypted certificate, you will need to provide a 9 word mnemonic passphrase to decrypt your certificate and your redemption code will be automatically extracted.
wallet.redeem.dialog.passphraseLabel: Passphrase to Decrypt the Lux Voucher Certificate
wallet.redeem.dialog.redemptionCodeHint: Enter your redemption key or upload a certificate
wallet.redeem.disclaimerOverlay.disclaim: ATTENTION: Redeeming on the Luxcoin Test-net will validate that your certificate or redemption key is correct and will allow you to redeem TEST-LUX for testing purposes only. KEEP your certificate or redemption key safe and secure. You will need to redeem again when Luxcoin SL launches the mainnet. TEST-LUX holds no value and cannot be exchanged.

You must send exactly 16120 LUX to collateral address.
